title: Lifeng Ren
text: I am a Ph.D. student in the Department of Applied Economics at the University of Minnesota. My research focuses on using applied econometrics, machine learning, and general equilibrium models to study the economic impacts of climate change and extreme weather events (e.g., wildfires) at global and local scales.

title: Lifeng Ren
